headline: United States Logistics Market Report 2025-2033 by Service, Category, Model Type, Type, Operation, Mode of Transport, End Use, States and Company Analysis
summary: The United States Logistics Market is projected to grow from US$ 2.01 trillion in 2024 to US$ 3.15 trillion by 2033, driven by a 5.11% CAGR. Key growth factors include e-commerce expansion, globalization of supply chains, demand for same-day delivery, automation, and infrastructure investments. Increased reliance on 3PL providers enhances efficiency and cost-effectiveness.
